review: Love the Fire Stick.  We don't have Amazon Prime (are considering it) but are Netflix users.  This little gadget can be used on a whole host of apps for streaming.  We got it for the RV television which is not a "smart" TV and it's great.  It pulls the streaming sites right into the menu for you.  It's a bit tricky to get set up if you are not familiar, the directions leave a lot to be desired as what we were seeing on the TV was not the same as the instructions referenced, but we muddled through it.  Not that big a deal.
